Package com.edinarobotics.utils.gamepad.gamepadfilters

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GamepadFilter
    This interface defines a GamepadFilter which is allowed to modify the values of the joystick axes of a given Gamepad.
    JoystickFilter
    This interface defines a JoystickFilter which is allowed to modify the values of the axes of a given Joystick.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConstantMultipleFilter
    This filter multiplies the values of each gamepad axis by a given value.
    DeadzoneFilter
    This filter applies a deadzone of a given radius to the joysticks of a gamepad.
    GamepadFilterSet
    This class applies multiple other GamepadFilters to a Gamepad.
    JoystickFilterSet
    This class applies multiple other JoystickFilters to a Joystick.
    PowerFilter
    This filter raises gamepad axis values to a given power while preserving their sign.
    SimpleGamepadFilter
    SimpleGamepadFilter is an abstract class used to quickly implement a gamepad filter that applies a single function to each axis of the gamepad.
    SimpleGamepadJoystickFilter
    SimpleGamepadJoystickFilter makes it possible to quickly create filters which act on both joysticks and gamepads.
    SimpleJoystickFilter
    SimpleJoystickFilter is an abstract class used to quickly implement a joystick filter that applies a single function to the x-, y- and twist axes of the joystick.
